list.name: Changes
list.comment: [*] Fixed bug surrounding Tetromino's spawning 1 cell down from the top. [+] Added detailed commenting to GameGrid class and cleaned up code. [+] Added PopFrame abstract class which will be used for all pop frames. [+] Added GameQuitConfirmation popup frame which appears when the user hits "Back" from the game menu. [+] Added ExitConfirmation popup frame which appears when the user hits "Exit" from the main menu.

MESSAGE.value: [*] Code cleanup for Configuration Panel by separating different drawing code into functions. Also moved some functions to UIHelper to de-clutter the class. [+] Added Tetromino enum which holds all possible tetromino shapes and information about them. Object also has randomTetromino() function which selects a random tetromino and gets the 2D array for that. [*] Initial work on Game Panel which plays the game itself. Currently it only draws the grid for the game based on the configuration settings. [*] TPanel abstract class now contains the JPanel reference for sub classes in itself to avoid code duplication. Also renamed load() method to paint() to better represent it's purpose. [*] Initial work on GameGrid which will contain information about the grid during gameplay.
[*] Updated GamePanel to include author of application. [+] Implemented Highscores Panel with dummy variables and back button to return to main menu.

[*] Updated UIHelper to get back button / author information since it is used in all menus. [+] Tetromino now able to be inserted into the grid. [*] Tetromino enum class now includes placeholders in each shape (ID 80) so it can be moved down the grid easier. [+] Added timer to GameController which moves all live tetromino cells down by 1 using the TetrisGrid shitGridDown() function.

[+] Added MovementListener class which acts as a listener for the game's controls. [+] Implemented shiftLeft which allows the user to move a Tetromino to the left [+] Implemented shiftRight which allows the user to move a tetromino to the right [*] Edited shiftDown to fix bugs involving a tetromino separating. Some still remain though. [*] Added reference to GameController from GameGrid to allow pausing/blocking of movement input while a new Tetromino is spawning. [*] Removed borders of menu panels as they were originally only for debugging.
[*] Implemented canMovedown() method which double checks that the entire Tetromino can move down before performing this action. Fixes various bugs related to Tetrominos splitting their blocks.

[*] Implemented canMoveDirection to check if the current tetromino can move in a specific direction (based on offset). Fix for bug related to Tetrominos not stacking correctly. [*] Added commenting to helper methods in TetrisGrid to further explain their function.

[+] Added rotateTetromino(), isRotationValid(), getPivot(), rotatePoint(), replaceTetromino() and identifyTetromino() to GameGrid class which all serve to implement Tetromino rotation. [+] Added RotatedPoint which is an object used to determine if a rotated point is a placeholder or not. [*] Tetromino class now stores data about pivot point for rotation. Currently redundant but may be implemented later. [*] MovementListener now listens for up arrow key (rotation bind).

[+] Implemented row clearing which clears rows of fixed blocks and moves the entire grid down by 1 cell. [+] Initial work on detecting when the game has been lost. Still some bugs surrounding this which should be fixed in next commit. [*] Deleted unneccessary debugging prints throughout the program. [*] Configuration now has no effect on the game as it is not needed in this milestone. Mainly board size which it was affecting.

[+] Implemented row clearing which clears rows of fixed blocks and moves the entire grid down by 1 cell. [+] Initial work on detecting when the game has been lost. Still some bugs surrounding this which should be fixed in next commit. [*] Deleted unneccessary debugging prints throughout the program. [*] Configuration now has no effect on the game as it is not needed at this time. Mainly board size which it was affecting.

[+] Implemented game pausing. Currently no popup to display that the game is actually paused but tetromino falling stops. [*] Updated Movementlistener to listen to the game pause keybind 'p'. [*] Renamed TetrisGrid to GameGrid
[*] Fixed bug relating to tetrominos still spawning after game has been lost.

[*] Fixed bug surrounding Tetromino's spawning 1 cell down from the top. [+] Added detailed commenting to GameGrid class and cleaned up code. [+] Added PopFrame abstract class which will be used for all pop frames. [+] Added GameQuitConfirmation popup frame which appears when the user hits "Back" from the game menu. [+] Added ExitConfirmation popup frame which appears when the user hits "Exit" from the main menu.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: [*] Fixed bug surrounding Tetromino's spawning 1 cell down from the top. [+] Added detailed commenting to GameGrid class and cleaned up code. [+] Added PopFrame abstract class which will be used for all pop frames. [+] Added GameQuitConfirmation popup frame which appears when the user hits "Back" from the game menu. [+] Added ExitConfirmation popup frame which appears when the user hits "Exit" from the main menu.
